sn14.15:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate.
sn14.15:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma sariputto sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim bhagavato avidure cankamati;
sn14.15:1.3: ayasmapi kho mahamoggallano sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim bhagavato avidure cankamati;
sn14.15:1.4: ayasmapi kho mahakassapo sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim bhagavato avidure cankamati;
sn14.15:1.5: ayasmapi kho anuruddho sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim bhagavato avidure cankamati;
sn14.15:1.6: ayasmapi kho punno mantaniputto sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim bhagavato avidure cankamati;
sn14.15:1.7: ayasmapi kho upali sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim bhagavato avidure cankamati;
sn14.15:1.8: ayasmapi kho anando sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim bhagavato avidure cankamati;
sn14.15:1.9: devadattopi kho sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim bhagavato avidure cankamati.
sn14.15:2.2: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, sariputtam sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim cankamantan”ti?
sn14.15:2.5: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, moggallanam sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim cankamantan”ti?
sn14.15:2.8: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, kassapam sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim cankamantan”ti?
sn14.15:2.11: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, anuruddham sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim cankamantan”ti?
sn14.15:2.14: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, punnam mantaniputtam sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim cankamantan”ti?
sn14.15:2.17: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, upalim sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim cankamantan”ti?
sn14.15:2.20: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, anandam sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim cankamantan”ti?
sn14.15:2.23: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, devadattam sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim cankamantan”ti?
sn14.15:3.4: Atitampi kho, bhikkhave, addhanam dhatusova satta samsandimsu samimsu.
sn14.15:4.1: Anagatampi kho, bhikkhave, addhanam dhatusova satta samsandissanti samessanti.
sn14.15:5.1: Etarahipi kho, bhikkhave, paccuppannam addhanam dhatusova satta samsandanti samenti.
